TextBlock.Text: Kasili: Ok, that marks the completion of the second component! At this rate we should be done in no time!
Makalu: Hold up Kasili, let's not get ahead of ourselves! We still have a lot of work to do before this project is complete.
Nela: This should provide plenty of stability while the device is in operation, but I still think we should have gone with the thicker coolent lines.
Silana: Let her celebrate Makalu, Kasili's never worked on such a large project so far from home, she has a right to be excited!
Kasili: Relax Nela, the coolent will be fine.
